1: Move block B1 and B2 to special area SA3.
2: Move block B2 to special area SA3.
3: Drop block B1 and pick up block B5.
4: Place block B1 in special area SA2.
5: Place block B1 in special area SA3.
7: Push blocks B1, B2, and B5 toward the top-right corner of the arena.
8: Place block B2 in special area SA1.
9: Move block B3 from special area SA3 to special area SA1.
